sqlMap.select:
SELECT /* 조회주석ID수정바람 */ '0' CHEK_FILD /*체크박스*/ , A.YEAR_MNTH , DECODE(A.CUST_CODE,'0000001260',' ',C.CUST_NAME) AS ORD , A.CUST_CODE , C.CUST_NAME , A.BRND_CODE /* 브랜드 코드 */ , E.BRND_NAME /* 브랜드 명 */ , A.MEDX_FLAG /* 매체구분 */ , H.COMM_CDNM AS MEDX_FLNM /* 매체구분 */ , '' AS XXAD_FLAG /*매체설명*/ , A.MEDX_CODE /* 매체사코드 */ , D.CUST_NAME AS MEDX_CDNM /* 매체사명 */ , '' AS RMED_CDNM , '' AS DTLX_CONT /*세부내용*/ , SUM(CASE WHEN A.BROD_FLAG = 'D029' OR A.BROD_FLAG BETWEEN 'D011' AND 'D027' THEN -ABS(A.AMNT_FILD) ELSE A.AMNT_FILD END)/#MONY_UNIT# AS AMNT_FILD /* 합계금액 */ , ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN A.BROD_FLAG = 'D029' OR A.BROD_FLAG BETWEEN 'D011' AND 'D027' THEN -ABS(A.AMNT_FILD) ELSE A.AMNT_FILD END)*SF_GET_COMIRATE(A.YEAR_MNTH,A.CUST_CODE,A.MEDX_CODE,A.MEDX_FLAG))/#MONY_UNIT# AS COMI_FILD /* 수수료금액 */ , SUM(CASE WHEN A.BROD_FLAG = 'D029' OR A.BROD_FLAG BETWEEN 'D011' AND 'D027' THEN -ABS(A.AMNT_FILD) ELSE A.AMNT_FILD END)*SF_GET_COMIRATE(A.YEAR_MNTH,A.CUST_CODE,A.MEDX_CODE,A.MEDX_FLAG)/#MONY_UNIT# AS COMI_FILD2 /* 수수료금액 */ , ROUND(SF_GET_COMIRATE(A.YEAR_MNTH,A.CUST_CODE,A.MEDX_CODE,A.MEDX_FLAG),4) AS COMI_RATE /* 수수료율 */ , '' AS MEMO_FILD /*기타*/ , '' AS AORX_FLAG /*AOR구분*/ FROM MD_ETMDXM A LEFT JOIN TA_CUSTXM C ON A.CUST_CODE = C.CUST_CODE LEFT JOIN TA_CUSTXM D ON A.MEDX_CODE = D.CUST_CODE LEFT JOIN MD_BRNDXM E ON A.CUST_CODE = E.CUST_CODE AND A.BRND_CODE = E.BRND_CODE LEFT JOIN MD_CODEXM H ON A.MEDX_FLAG = H.COMM_CODE WHERE A.YEAR_MNTH >= #YEAR_MNTH# /* 년월 */ AND A.YEAR_MNTH <= #YEAR_MNTH2# AND A.TRTX_NUMB IS NOT NULL AND A.INPT_PATH = 'C'
A.MEDX_CODE = #MEDX_CODE# /* 매체사코드 */
A.CUST_CODE = #CUST_CODE# /* 광고주코드 */
A.BRND_CODE = #BRND_CODE# /* 브랜드코드 */
C.CUST_NAME LIKE '%'||#CUST_NAME#||'%' /* 광고주명 */
GROUP BY A.YEAR_MNTH, A.CUST_CODE , C.CUST_NAME,A.BRND_CODE,E.BRND_NAME, A.MEDX_FLAG, H.COMM_CDNM , A.MEDX_CODE, D.CUST_NAME UNION ALL SELECT /* 조회주석ID수정바람 */ '0' CHEK_FILD /*체크박스*/ , A.YEAR_MNTH , DECODE(A.CUST_CODE,'0000001260',' ',C.CUST_NAME) AS ORD , A.CUST_CODE , C.CUST_NAME , A.BRND_CODE /* 브랜드 코드 */ , E.BRND_NAME /* 브랜드 명 */ , A.MEDX_FLAG /* 매체구분 */ , H.COMM_CDNM AS MEDX_FLNM /* 매체구분 */ , '' AS XXAD_FLAG /*매체설명*/ , A.MEDX_CODE /* 매체사코드 */ , D.CUST_NAME AS MEDX_CDNM /* 매체사명 */ , '' AS RMED_CDNM , '' AS DTLX_CONT /*세부내용*/ , (CASE WHEN A.BROD_FLAG = 'D029' OR A.BROD_FLAG BETWEEN 'D011' AND 'D027' THEN -ABS(A.AMNT_FILD) ELSE A.AMNT_FILD END)/#MONY_UNIT# AS AMNT_FILD /* 합계금액 */ , NVL(A.COMI_FILD,(CASE WHEN A.BROD_FLAG = 'D029' OR A.BROD_FLAG BETWEEN 'D011' AND 'D027' THEN -ABS(A.AMNT_FILD) ELSE A.AMNT_FILD END)*A.COMI_RATE)/#MONY_UNIT# AS COMI_FILD /* 수수료금액 */ , NVL(A.COMI_FILD,(CASE WHEN A.BROD_FLAG = 'D029' OR A.BROD_FLAG BETWEEN 'D011' AND 'D027' THEN -ABS(A.AMNT_FILD) ELSE A.AMNT_FILD END)*A.COMI_RATE)/#MONY_UNIT# AS COMI_FILD2 /* 수수료금액 */ , A.COMI_RATE /* 수수료율 */ , '' AS MEMO_FILD /*기타*/ , '' AS AORX_FLAG /*AOR구분*/ FROM MD_ETMDXM A LEFT JOIN TA_CUSTXM C ON A.CUST_CODE = C.CUST_CODE LEFT JOIN TA_CUSTXM D ON A.MEDX_CODE = D.CUST_CODE LEFT JOIN MD_BRNDXM E ON A.CUST_CODE = E.CUST_CODE AND A.BRND_CODE = E.BRND_CODE LEFT JOIN MD_CODEXM H ON A.MEDX_FLAG = H.COMM_CODE WHERE A.YEAR_MNTH >= #YEAR_MNTH# /* 년월 */ AND A.YEAR_MNTH <= #YEAR_MNTH2# AND A.TRTX_NUMB IS NOT NULL AND A.INPT_PATH != 'C'
A.MEDX_CODE = #MEDX_CODE# /* 매체사코드 */
A.CUST_CODE = #CUST_CODE# /* 광고주코드 */
A.BRND_CODE = #BRND_CODE# /* 브랜드코드 */
C.CUST_NAME LIKE '%'||#CUST_NAME#||'%' /* 광고주명 */
ORDER BY YEAR_MNTH,ORD,CUST_NAME,BRND_NAME,MEDX_FLAG

SELECT /* MRPA0010.SEARCH00 미완료 조회(거래명세서) */ '0' CHEK_FILD /*체크박스*/ , A.YEAR_MNTH , A.CUST_CODE /*광고주코드*/ , C.CUST_NAME /* 광고주 사업장명 */ , A.BRND_CODE /* 브랜드 코드 */ , G.BRND_NAME /* 브랜드 명 */ , A.MEDX_FLAG /* 매체구분 */ , H.COMM_CDNM AS MEDX_FLNM /* 매체구분 */ , '' AS XXAD_FLAG /*매체설명*/ , A.MEDX_CODE /* 매체사코드 */ , D.CUST_NAME AS MEDX_CDNM /* 매체사명 */ , I.CUST_NAME AS RMED_CDNM , '' AS DTLX_CONT /*세부내용*/ , A.AMNT_FILD/#MONY_UNIT# AMNT_FILD /*광고료*/ , A.COMI_FILD/#MONY_UNIT# COMI_FILD /*수수료*/ , A.COMI_RATE /*수수료율*/ , A.MEMO_FILD /*기타*/ , AORX_FLAG /*AOR구분*/ FROM MD_CTMDXM A /* [거래명세서(상세)] */ LEFT JOIN TA_CUSTXM C ON A.CUST_CODE = C.CUST_CODE LEFT JOIN TA_CUSTXM D ON A.MEDX_CODE = D.CUST_CODE LEFT JOIN MD_BRNDXM G ON A.CUST_CODE = G.CUST_CODE AND A.BRND_CODE = G.BRND_CODE LEFT JOIN MD_CODEXM H ON A.MEDX_FLAG = H.COMM_CODE LEFT JOIN MD_CUSTXM I ON A.RMED_CODE = I.CUST_CODE AND A.MEDX_CODE=I.HIGH_CODE WHERE A.TRTX_NUMB IS NOT NULL AND A.YEAR_MNTH >= #YEAR_MNTH# /* 년월 */ AND A.YEAR_MNTH <= #YEAR_MNTH2#
2=1
1=1
A.MEDX_FLAG = #MEDX_FLAG#
A.MEDX_CODE = #MEDX_CODE# /* 매체사코드 */
A.CUST_CODE = #CUST_CODE# /* 광고주코드 */
C.CUST_NAME LIKE '%'||#CUST_NAME#||'%' /* 광고주명 */
A.RMED_CODE = #RMED_CODE# /* 매체코드 */
A.BRND_CODE = #BRND_CODE# /* 브랜드 */
UNION ALL SELECT /* MRPA0010.SEARCH00 미완료 조회(거래명세서) */ '0' CHEK_FILD /*체크박스*/ , A.YEAR_MNTH , A.CUST_CODE /*광고주코드*/ , C.CUST_NAME /* 광고주 사업장명 */ , A.BRND_CODE /* 브랜드 코드 */ , G.BRND_NAME /* 브랜드 명 */ , A.MEDX_FLAG /* 매체구분 */ , H.COMM_CDNM AS MEDX_FLNM /* 매체구분 */ , H.COMM_CDNM AS XXAD_FLAG /*매체설명*/ , A.MEDX_CODE /* 매체사코드 */ , D.CUST_NAME AS MEDX_CDNM /* 매체사명 */ , I.CUST_NAME AS RMED_CDNM , A.STDR_STEP||A.STDR_CTMT||' '||A.COLR_DEGR AS DTLX_CONT /*세부내용*/ , A.AMNT_FILD/#MONY_UNIT# AMNT_FILD /*광고료*/ , A.COMI_FILD/#MONY_UNIT# COMI_FILD /*수수료*/ , A.COMI_RATE /*수수료율*/ , A.MEMO_FILD /*기타*/ , AORX_FLAG /*AOR구분*/ FROM MD_PTMDXM A /* [거래명세서(상세)] */ LEFT JOIN TA_CUSTXM C ON A.CUST_CODE = C.CUST_CODE LEFT JOIN TA_CUSTXM D ON A.MEDX_CODE = D.CUST_CODE LEFT JOIN MD_BRNDXM G ON A.CUST_CODE = G.CUST_CODE AND A.BRND_CODE = G.BRND_CODE LEFT JOIN MD_CODEXM H ON A.MEDX_FLAG = H.COMM_CODE LEFT JOIN MD_CUSTXM I ON A.RMED_CODE = I.CUST_CODE AND A.MEDX_CODE=I.HIGH_CODE LEFT JOIN MD_CODEXM J ON A.PTAD_FLAG = H.COMM_CODE WHERE A.TRTX_NUMB IS NOT NULL AND A.YEAR_MNTH >= #YEAR_MNTH# /* 년월 */ AND A.YEAR_MNTH <= #YEAR_MNTH2#
1=1
1=1
A.MEDX_FLAG = #MEDX_FLAG#
A.MEDX_CODE = #MEDX_CODE# /* 매체사코드 */
A.CUST_CODE = #CUST_CODE# /* 광고주코드 */
C.CUST_NAME LIKE '%'||#CUST_NAME#||'%' /* 광고주명 */
A.RMED_CODE = #RMED_CODE# /* 매체코드 */
A.BRND_CODE = #BRND_CODE# /* 브랜드 */
UNION ALL SELECT /* MRPA0010.SEARCH00 미완료 조회(거래명세서) */ '0' CHEK_FILD /*체크박스*/ , A.YEAR_MNTH , A.CUST_CODE /*광고주코드*/ , C.CUST_NAME /* 광고주 사업장명 */ , A.BRND_CODE /* 브랜드 코드 */ , G.BRND_NAME /* 브랜드 명 */ , A.MEDX_FLAG /* 매체구분 */ , H.COMM_CDNM AS MEDX_FLNM /* 매체구분 */ , '' AS XXAD_FLAG /*매체설명*/ , A.MEDX_CODE /* 매체사코드 */ , D.CUST_NAME AS MEDX_CDNM /* 매체사명 */ , I.CUST_NAME AS RMED_CDNM , A.MATT_NAME AS DTLX_CONT /*세부내용*/ , A.AMNT_FILD/#MONY_UNIT# AMNT_FILD /*광고료*/ , A.COMI_FILD/#MONY_UNIT# COMI_FILD /*수수료*/ , A.COMI_RATE /*수수료율*/ , A.MEMO_FILD /*기타*/ , AORX_FLAG /*AOR구분*/ FROM MD_ITMDXM A /* [거래명세서(상세)] */ LEFT JOIN TA_CUSTXM C ON A.CUST_CODE = C.CUST_CODE LEFT JOIN TA_CUSTXM D ON A.MEDX_CODE = D.CUST_CODE LEFT JOIN MD_BRNDXM G ON A.CUST_CODE = G.CUST_CODE AND A.BRND_CODE = G.BRND_CODE LEFT JOIN MD_CODEXM H ON 'A008' = H.COMM_CODE LEFT JOIN MD_CUSTXM I ON A.RMED_CODE = I.CUST_CODE AND A.MEDX_CODE=I.HIGH_CODE WHERE A.TRTX_NUMB IS NOT NULL AND A.YEAR_MNTH >= #YEAR_MNTH# /* 년월 */ AND A.YEAR_MNTH <= #YEAR_MNTH2#
2=1
1=1
A.MEDX_FLAG = #MEDX_FLAG#
A.MEDX_CODE = #MEDX_CODE# /* 매체사코드 */
A.CUST_CODE = #CUST_CODE# /* 광고주코드 */
C.CUST_NAME LIKE '%'||#CUST_NAME#||'%' /* 광고주명 */
A.RMED_CODE = #RMED_CODE# /* 매체코드 */
A.BRND_CODE = #BRND_CODE# /* 브랜드 */
UNION ALL SELECT /* MRPA0010.SEARCH00 미완료 조회(거래명세서) */ '0' CHEK_FILD /*체크박스*/ , A.YEAR_MNTH , A.CUST_CODE /*광고주코드*/ , C.CUST_NAME /* 광고주 사업장명 */ , A.BRND_CODE /* 브랜드 코드 */ , G.BRND_NAME /* 브랜드 명 */ , A.MEDX_FLAG /* 매체구분 */ , H.COMM_CDNM AS MEDX_FLNM /* 매체구분 */ , A.MATT_NAME AS XXAD_FLAG /*매체설명*/ , A.MEDX_CODE /* 매체사코드 */ , D.CUST_NAME AS MEDX_CDNM /* 매체사명 */ , I.CUST_NAME AS RMED_CDNM , '' AS DTLX_CONT /*세부내용*/ , A.AMNT_FILD/#MONY_UNIT# AMNT_FILD /*광고료*/ , A.COMI_FILD/#MONY_UNIT# COMI_FILD /*수수료*/ , A.COMI_RATE /*수수료율*/ , A.MEMO_FILD /*기타*/ , AORX_FLAG /*AOR구분*/ FROM MD_ODMDXM A /* [거래명세서(상세)] */ LEFT JOIN TA_CUSTXM C ON A.CUST_CODE = C.CUST_CODE LEFT JOIN TA_CUSTXM D ON A.MEDX_CODE = D.CUST_CODE LEFT JOIN MD_BRNDXM G ON A.CUST_CODE = G.CUST_CODE AND A.BRND_CODE = G.BRND_CODE LEFT JOIN MD_CODEXM H ON 'A007' = H.COMM_CODE LEFT JOIN MD_CUSTXM I ON A.RMED_CODE = I.CUST_CODE AND A.MEDX_CODE=I.HIGH_CODE WHERE A.TRTX_NUMB IS NOT NULL AND A.YEAR_MNTH >= #YEAR_MNTH# /* 년월 */ AND A.YEAR_MNTH <= #YEAR_MNTH2#
2=1
1=1
A.MEDX_FLAG = #MEDX_FLAG#
A.MEDX_CODE = #MEDX_CODE# /* 매체사코드 */
A.CUST_CODE = #CUST_CODE# /* 광고주코드 */
C.CUST_NAME LIKE '%'||#CUST_NAME#||'%' /* 광고주명 */
A.RMED_CODE = #RMED_CODE# /* 매체코드 */
A.BRND_CODE = #BRND_CODE# /* 브랜드 */
ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(YEAR_MNTH),MEDX_FLAG,CUST_CODE,BRND_NAME,MEDX_CODE

SELECT /* MRPA0010.SEARCH01 광고주목록 가져오기 */ A.CUST_CODE /* 광고주코드 */ , A.CUST_NAME /* 거래처명 */ , A.CUST_NAME AS CLIENT_NAME /* 거래처명 */ , ' ' AS USEX_CODE /* NULL */ FROM TA_CUSTXM A LEFT JOIN TA_CUSTXD B ON A.CUST_CODE = B.CUST_CODE WHERE 1=1 AND B.CUCL_CODE = 'FA260110'
